statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); session_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id'); input_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.input_tokens // 0'); output_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.output_tokens // 0'); cache_creation_input_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.cache_creation_input_tokens // 0'); cache_read_input_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.current_usage.cache_read_input_tokens // 0'); total_tokens=$((input_tokens + output_tokens + cache_creation_input_tokens + cache_read_input_tokens)); context_window_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 0'); if [ "$context_window_size" -gt 0 ]; then context_used=$(( (total_tokens * 100 + context_window_size / 2) / context_window_size )); else context_used=0; fi; if [ "$context_used" -gt 50 ]; then context_color_code=31; else context_color_code=32; fi; if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m(%s)\033[0m | \033[35m%s\033[0m \033[%sm(%d%%)\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[90m%s\033[0m' "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$branch" "$model_name" "$context_color_code" "$context_used" "$output_style" "$session_id"; else printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m | \033[35m%s\033[0m \033[%sm(%d%%)\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m | \033[90m%s\033[0m' "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$model_name" "$context_color_code" "$context_used" "$output_style" "$session_id"; fi
